channel.title: personal on Ramblings of a cloud engineer
channel.description: Recent content in personal on Ramblings of a cloud engineer

item.title: Journey from Testing into Software Development
item.description: Hello, Dear Reader! Settle in for a long one this time. I would like to write about my journey from being a Tester back in 2004 to being a software engineer today ( 2024 ). A mere 20 year long journey. I’m going to write down how I got this far, what it took, the sacrifices, fears, doubts and all the things in between. Let’s get started. The early days Around 2002, I became a student for a two year long certificate study for a position called Software Programmer.
